channel.title: [PI] RuneX Offical Release Hard Coded [PI]
channel.description:
Hello I made this server about a month ago i started getting serious with the coding so i fixed alot remade the source not much but alittle and now i decided that i want to release it to other people so well dont say its junk if u havent dowloaded it as far as ive seen its the best PI source so far imo but well i atleast took an month on me recoding the client and source and just so u know the client has vesta claws and the other usual and its still 5 mb the cache is with so seriously at least leave an replie and il feel appreciated thanks.
Details: Tormented Demons [Done] Epic Npc Combat [Done Perfect Pking [Done] Ancient Curses [Done] Corporeal Demons [Done] Spirit Shields [Done] Chaotic Weapons [Done] Skillcape Emotes [Done] Chaotic Minigame [Done] Remade base more stable now [Done] fixed 99% of all glitched [Almost] Fixed Client only 5mb 90% of all runescape items 100% emotes 100% fixed jail 100% fixed donator status 100% Woodcutting DONE 100% Fishing DONE 2 worlds Pvp or skilling and wild pk [Done] Hunting 50% firemaking 100% DONE Pest Control 100% Done fight pits (remade with a reward) 100% done Clan wars 90%/ 100% a look alike from runescape DONE
PICS: Will upload more tomorrow
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/287lrut.gif[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/x4jeki.gif[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/16a8spy.png[/img] [img]http://lh3.ggpht.com/_SE-nq8pX4bo/TNpLf5r9LDI/AAAAAAAAADw/z4szL_i3gv4/pic1.jpg[/img] [img]http://lh5.ggpht.com/_SE-nq8pX4bo/TNpR2Y0x36I/AAAAAAAAAEI/-8Rftp1XO9A/pic5.jpg[/img]
Download Link:
Client: * Source: *
Have fun guys gl.
Info about me:
Ive not really used mopar much but i decided to release it here also so i did and there u go guys but im pretty trusted on rsbot and r4ne-server u can scan it urself its no virus..
